document.full_text: james cameron,  the director of "avatar" and an apostle for 3-d,  said he had signed off on an open letter that is expected to caution studios against rushing into any arrangement to make films available through on-demand services shortly after their theatrical release.
document.title: 'avatar' director cautions against early video-on-demand release
lines_and_colors: james cameron,  the director of "avatar" and an apostle for 3-d,  said he had signed off on an open letter that is expected to caution studios against rushing into any arrangement to make films available through on-demand services shortly after their theatrical release.
